reviewText: I had bought HITLER AND THE OCCULT dvd last week and was disappointed. this dvd MORE than makes up for it. it spends about an hour from the occult perspective.  I have ALWAYS been interested in THE SPEAR OF DESTINY. the narrator referred to it as " the spear that killed Jesus ". but Jesus was dead BEFORE the Spear pierced Him. so either [A] he is misinforming the viewers... or [B] he knows the secret behind It and is misleading the viewers. other than that, I found the purchase well worth it.
Hitler and National Socialism with occult overtones. Nothing new here but still interesting and enjoyable.
